name: harsh
headerTaglineFour: I'm a builder who's passionate about sustainable impact.

projects.title: CloudCuisine
projects.description: A recipe management and sharing React application using AWS cloud services.

aboutpara: I'm Harshpreet Singh, a software developer passionate about backend development, cloud computing, and DevOps. I enjoy solving challenging problems, optimizing performance, and building scalable software solutions.

Currently, I'm a Software Developer Co-Op at Kinaxis, where I work with C++ to improve system performance and enhance infrastructure. I've also worked on REST APIs, cloud services, and large-scale framework migrations in my previous roles.

I love working with technologies like AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD to streamline development workflows. Whether it's writing clean, efficient code or optimizing build pipelines, I'm always looking for ways to improve and learn.
Outside of work, I enjoy contributing to open-source projects, experimenting with new technologies, and sharing my knowledge with the community.

resume.name: harsh.
resume.tagline: Graduate in Computer Science from Dalhousie University, passionate about impactful technology.
resume.description: I am a software developer with experience in C++, Java, and cloud technologies, specializing in building scalable and high-performance applications. I have worked on caching solutions, API development, and cloud-based systems, contributing to performance improvements and large-scale migrations. Passionate about backend development, DevOps, and designing software architectures.

experiences.type: Data Structures and Algorithms, Network Computing, Advanced Cloud Computing, Advanced Web Development, Advanced Database Systems
